short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds helpful features to TradeMe.co.nz such as a filter to see all negative feedback of user easily and long shipping time warnings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds new features when browsing TradeMe.co.nz

1. When looking at a sellers feedback you can filter out and show all of the negative feedback without having to go through page by page.

2. Add a warning at the top of the screen when you are viewing items from sellers not located in New Zealand.
